remarks: A device to add commutativity to various sorts of rings.  I use ` ran g ` because I suppose ` g ` has a neutral element and therefore is onto.  (Contributed by FL, 6-Sep-2009.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
df-com2 $p |- Com2 = { <. g , h >. | A. a e. ran g A. b e. ran g ( a h b ) = ( b h a ) } $.
$d a b g h $.
